Highlighted Clause: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, trade, resell or exploit for any commercial purposes, any portion of the service
Plain Language Summary: You can't use any part of the service for your own commercial benefit, such as selling or trading, without being part of the reseller service.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree reserves the right to suspend service at any time without prior notice if a service is affected or degraded
Plain Language Summary: The company can shut down its service whenever it wants, without giving you prior notice, especially if your use affects the service's performance.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree shall have the right to remove any content that violates the ToS or is otherwise objectionable
Plain Language Summary: The company can delete any of your content if it breaks their rules or they find it inappropriate.

Highlighted Clause: Cause for such termination shall include breaches or violations of the ToS or other incorporated agreements or guidelines
Plain Language Summary: Your account can be closed if you break the terms or any other related rules.

Highlighted Clause: You are responsible for those fees, including those fees associated with the display or delivery of advertisements
Plain Language Summary: You must pay for all costs related to your use of the service, including ad-related charges.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree's proprietary rights are protected by intellectual property and other laws
Plain Language Summary: The service owns its technology and content, which are legally protected, and you must respect that.

Highlighted Clause: You acknowledge that Infinityfree may or may not pre-screen content, but shall have the right to pre-screen, refuse or remove any content
Plain Language Summary: The company has the right (but not the obligation) to check, reject, or delete any content on its service.

Highlighted Clause: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process, and keep it updated
Plain Language Summary: You need to give true and up-to-date information when you sign up and keep it current.

Highlighted Clause: Upon receipt of a death certificate, your account may be terminated and all contents permanently deleted
Plain Language Summary: Your account and its content will be deleted permanently once the company gets a copy of your death certificate.

Highlighted Clause: Any claim or cause of action related to the service must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause of action arose
Plain Language Summary: If you have a legal claim related to the service, you must file it within one year.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree may provide you with notices, including changes to the ToS, by email, regular mail or postings on the service
Plain Language Summary: The company will inform you about any changes to the terms through email, mail, or on their service.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree may, under certain circumstances and without prior notice, immediately terminate your account
Plain Language Summary: Your account can be shut down immediately without warning under certain conditions.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree will not be liable for any loss or damage from your use of the service
Plain Language Summary: The company isn't responsible for any harm or losses you might face from using the service.

Highlighted Clause: You understand that the technical processing and transmission of the service may involve transmissions over various networks
Plain Language Summary: Your use of the service will result in data transmissions across different networks that the company doesn't own.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree is not responsible for any changes in services provided by a 3rd party provider
Plain Language Summary: The company isn't accountable for changes or issues with services from other companies they work with.

Highlighted Clause: Infinityfree may use advert blockers to subsidize the costs of running the service
Plain Language Summary: The company may use ads and block ad-blocking tools to help pay for the service they provide.
